@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The 'Qookery' scripting context is always available to XML authors and provides
a number of commonly used methods.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Methods ported from root Qookery static class

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Additional methods of use to XML authors

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Use resource loader to load a resource

@param.name: @param
@param.body: resourceUri {String} URI of the resource to load
@param.description: URI of the resource to load

@param.name: @param
@param.body: thisArg {Object ? null} object to set as this for callbacks
@param.description: object to set as this for callbacks

@param.name: @param
@param.body: successCallback {Function} callback to call after successful load
@param.description: callback to call after successful load

@param.name: @param
@param.body: failCallback {Function} callback to call in case load fails
@param.description: callback to call in case load fails

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String|null} loaded resource as text in case call is synchronous
@return.description: loaded resource as text in case call is synchronous

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Open a window with a form as content

@param.name: @param
@param.body: form {String|qookery.IFormComponent} URL of the XML form to load, or a form component
@param.description: URL of the XML form to load, or a form component

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
options {Map ? null} any of FormWindow options in addition to any of those below
  • model {any} optional model to load into the form
  • variables {Map ? null} optional variables to pass to the form parser
  • onClose {Function ? null} callback that will receive the form's result property when window is closed
@param.description:
any of FormWindow options in addition to any of those below
  • model {any} optional model to load into the form
  • variables {Map ? null} optional variables to pass to the form parser
  • onClose {Function ? null} callback that will receive the form's result property when window is closed

@param.name: @param
@param.body: thisArg {Object ? null} object to set as this for callbacks
@param.description: object to set as this for callbacks

@param.name: @param
@param.body: specification {String} valid format specification or a registered factory or format name
@param.description: valid format specification or a registered factory or format name

@param.name: @param
@param.body: options {Map ? null} any number of options to pass to the format class constructor
@param.description: any number of options to pass to the format class constructor

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qx.util.format.IFormat} new format instance or null if not available
@return.description: new format instance or null if not available

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Programmatically create a new Qookery component

@param.name: @param
@param.body: parentComponent {qookery.IContainerComponent} parent component to hold new component
@param.description: parent component to hold new component

@param.name: @param
@param.body: componentName {String} qualified or symbolic name of the new component's implementation class
@param.description: qualified or symbolic name of the new component's implementation class

@param.name: @param
@param.body: attributes {Map ? null} any number of attributes understood by new component implementation
@param.description: any number of attributes understood by new component implementation

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Ascend the form hierarchy, starting from given form

@param.name: @param
@param.body: form {qookery.IFormComponent} the form to start ascending from
@param.description: the form to start ascending from

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
callback {Function} a function that will be called with each encountered form
		- a non-undefined return value breaks the ascension
@param.description:
a function that will be called with each encountered form
		- a non-undefined return value breaks the ascension

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Iterate all components under the hierarchy starting with given component

@param.name: @param
@param.body: component {qookery.IComponent} the component to start descending from
@param.description: the component to start descending from

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
callback {Function} a function that will be called with each encountered component
		- a non-undefined return value breaks the recursion
@param.description:
a function that will be called with each encountered component
		- a non-undefined return value breaks the recursion

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {any} value returned by callback if descending was interrupted or undefined
@return.description: value returned by callback if descending was interrupted or undefined

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Starting from given component, descend all children altering the value of a component property

@param.name: @param
@param.body: component {qookery.IComponent} the component to start descending from
@param.description: the component to start descending from

@param.name: @param
@param.body: propertyName {String} the name of the property to set
@param.description: the name of the property to set

@param.name: @param
@param.body: propertyValue {any} the new value to set
@param.description: the new value to set

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Load a Qookery form from a URL

@param.name: @param
@param.body: formUrl {String} URI of the resource to load
@param.description: URI of the resource to load

@param.name: @param
@param.body: thisArg {Object} object to set as this for callbacks
@param.description: object to set as this for callbacks

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
options {Map ? null} operation options
  • async {Boolean} if true load asynchronously - this is the default
  • fail {Function} callback to call in case load fails
  • model {Object} form model
  • success {Function} callback to call after successful load
  • variables {Object ? null} variables that will be available in xml $.variableName
@param.description:
operation options
  • async {Boolean} if true load asynchronously - this is the default
  • fail {Function} callback to call in case load fails
  • model {Object} form model
  • success {Function} callback to call after successful load
  • variables {Object ? null} variables that will be available in xml $.variableName

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {qookery.IComponent|null} loaded form component if synchronous or null
@return.description: loaded form component if synchronous or null
